definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: (servant of Ēl; on this and foll. cf. Ph. [[עבדאלם]], Nab. [[עבדאלהא]], Sin. [[עבדאלהי]], etc., Lzb:332 Cook:87; Sab. [[עבדלת]] = [[[עבדאלת]]] Hal:168 DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 16; v. also Gray:Prop. N. 309, No. 53);—a Gadite 1Ch 5:15; LXX Abdehl, A LXXL Abdihl.
